title: Moving on From Miscommunication
itunes:summary:
Greg and Erin talk with John about how they've learned to get passed misunderstandings, and why working through miscommunication is worth it.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "The Intimate Connection" with your donation of any amount: https://secure.anedot.com/focus-on-the-family/don-fofm-podcast-2021-03-09?source_code=1100201&donation_pledge_code=FRIENDSFAM

Get more resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/moving-on-from-miscommunication/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
